title: KobaltQuill said to post this on the board hope this is the right thread.
body:
I was thinking that would it be possible to put the champion scores and LP earned and lost on the match history screen so you know how you went later.
As I usually exit the game and hit the play again button without checking my scores and stuff. But when I have down time I have no clue what I scored.

replies.body: It's a good idea but something Riot will never ever do. They don't want to be transparent in how they calculate ANYTHING in this game, not even showing it to other players other than yourself. It is like they are hiding how and why they are catering to the top 1% of players and not caring about the general populace.
